author: Matt Lakin
comment: Might be helpful to a photographer or film student otherwise kind of limited but I like it. He could expand function a bit

reply.author: Irony Software
reply.content: Hi! Thanks for your answer. Can you offer me some feature for this app? I would add any good idea with pleasure.

author: Philip Ascroft

reply.author: Irony Software
reply.content: Hi, this app working only with watches with ambient light sensor: for now it's only Moto 360 and Sony Smartwatch 3

title: First work on G watch R
